Name: Super Hyperspace Avenger
About the game: The game takes place in the near future. Enemies have taken over your country and destroyed your home. The only thing left for you is to get on the plane and take revenge. Blast your way through hundreds of enemies and dodge billions of bullet. The sky is infected with enemies, so get up quickly and survive for as long as you can and avenge your death in the next run. The game takes place at hypersonic speeds and is very intense. You only have three lives before you start over, so be careful and avoid the bullets. • Fast-paced arcade gameplay. • Different types of enemies. • Beautiful pixel art. • Unique pickups
